data_tests.description: Add descriptions to custom singular tests

name.description: The name of the singular test

description.description: A description of the test's purpose, how it is implemented, and perhaps what you should do if it starts failing.

items.$comment: NB: depends_on is not strictly required, but is _expected_ according to the documentation

relation.description: Required when defining your snapshot in YAML instead of using a legacy snapshot block.

name.description: How you will identify the schema in {{ source() }} calls. Unless `schema` is also set, this will be the name of the schema in the database.

overrides.title: Package to Override
overrides.description: The name of another package installed in your project. If that package has a source with the same name as this one, its properties will be applied on top of the base properties of the overridden source. https://docs.getdbt.com/reference/resource-properties/overrides

schema.description: The schema name as stored in the database. Only needed if you want to use a different `name` than what exists in the database (otherwise `name` is used by default)

name.title: Name
name.description: How you will identify the table in {{ source() }} calls. Unless `identifier` is also set, this will be the name of the table in the database.

event_time.description: The column that represents the actual moment the row's event happened. Contrast with, for example, when it was loaded to the warehouse.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The table name as stored in the database. Only needed if you want to give the source a different name than what exists in the database (otherwise `name` is used by default)

loaded_at_field.description: Which column to check during data freshness tests. Only needed if the table has a different loaded_at_field to the one defined on the source overall.

rows.description: When `format` is `dict`, each item should be a dictionary containing a key-value pair for each column and its value, e.g. `{id: 1, code: 'ABC'}`
When `format` is csv or sql, a string containing comma-separated headers and values. Alternatively provide a fixture. Use the pipe character | to create a multi-line string in YAML.

fixture.description: Only relevant when format is csv. Specify the name of a fixture instead of providing `rows`.

rows.description: When `format` is `dict`, each item should be a dictionary containing a key-value pair for each column and its value, e.g. `{id: 1, code: 'ABC'}`
When `format` is csv or sql, a string containing comma-separated headers and values. Alternatively provide a fixture. Use the pipe character | to create a multi-line string in YAML.

fixture.description: Only relevant when format is csv. Specify the name of a fixture instead of providing `rows`.

input.description: The relation whose inputs you need to mock. Enclose in ref or source without curly braces

model.description: The name of the model whose behaviour you are testing. Does not need to be wrapped in a ref.

policy_tags.title: Policy tags
policy_tags.description: Configurations, specific to BigQuery adapter, used to set policy tags on specific columns, enabling column-level security. Only relevant when `persist_docs.columns` is true.

docs_config.title: Docs config
docs_config.description: Configurations for the appearance of nodes in the dbt documentation.

node_color.description: The color of the node on the DAG in the documentation. It must be an Hex code or a valid CSS color name.

grants.description: grant config. each key is a database permission and the value is the grantee of that permission

event_time.description: The column that represents the actual moment the row's event happened. Contrast with, for example, when it was loaded to the warehouse.

grant_access_to.title: Authorized views
grant_access_to.description: Configuration, specific to BigQuery adapter, used to setup authorized views.

hours_to_expiration.description: Configuration specific to BigQuery adapter used to set an expiration delay (in hours) to a table.

kms_key_name.description: Configuration of the KMS key name, specific to BigQuery adapter.

labels.title: Label configs
labels.description: Configuration specific to BigQuery adapter used to add labels and tags to tables/views created by dbt.

persist_docs_config.title: Persist docs config
persist_docs_config.description: Configurations for the persistence of the dbt documentation.

test_configs.title: Test configs
test_configs.description: Configurations set here will override configs set in dbt_project.yml.
